verses.verse: Does <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of you, when he <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G4229>case<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> his <S%G2087>neighbor,<s%> <S%G5111>dare<s%> to <S%G2919>go<s%> to <S%G2919>law<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> the <S%G94>unrighteous,<s%> and not <S%G1909>before<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%>?

<S%G2228>Or<s%> do you not <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G40>saints<s%> will <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>? And <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> is <S%G2919>judged<s%> by you, are you not <S%G370>competent<s%> [to constitute] the <S%G1646>smallest<s%> <S%G2922>law<s%> <S%G2922>courts<s%>?
Do you not <S%G3609>know<s%> that we shall <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%>? <S%G3386>How<s%> <S%G3386>much<s%> <S%G3386>more,<s%> <S%G982>matters<s%> of this <S%G982>life<s%>?

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2922>law<s%> <S%G2922>courts<s%> dealing with <S%G982>matters<s%> of this <S%G982>life,<s%> do you <S%G2523>appoint<s%> them as judges who are of <S%G1848>no<s%> <S%G1848>account<s%> in the <S%G1577>church<s%>?

I <S%G3004>say<s%> [this] to your <S%G1791>shame.<s%> [Is it] <S%G3779>so,<s%> [that] there is not <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G4680>man<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> will be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G1252>decide<s%> <S%G303>between<s%> <S%G3319><s%> his <S%G80>brethren,<s%>
but <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2919>goes<s%> to <S%G2919>law<s%> with <S%G80>brother,<s%> and that <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G571>unbelievers<s%>?

<S%G3654>Actually,<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> it is <S%G2235>already<s%> a <S%G2275>defeat<s%> for you, that you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2917>lawsuits<s%> with <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another.<s%> <S%G1223>Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> not <S%G3123>rather<s%> be <S%G91>wronged<s%>? <S%G1223>Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> not <S%G3123>rather<s%> be <S%G650>defrauded<s%>?
On the <S%G235>contrary,<s%> you <S%G4771>yourselves<s%> <S%G91>wrong<s%> and <S%G650>defraud,<s%> and that [your] <S%G80>brethren.<s%>

<S%G2228>Or<s%> do you not <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> shall not <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>? Do not be <S%G4105>deceived;<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G4205>fornicators,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1496>idolaters,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G3432>adulterers,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G3120>effeminate,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G733>homosexuals,<s%>

<S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G2812>thieves,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> [the] <S%G4123>covetous,<s%> <S%G3756>nor<s%> <S%G3183>drunkards,<s%> <S%G3756>nor<s%> <S%G3060>revilers,<s%> <S%G3756>nor<s%> <S%G727>swindlers,<s%> shall <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G3778>such<s%> were <S%G5100>some<s%> of you; but you were <S%G628>washed,<s%> but you were <S%G37>sanctified,<s%> but you were <S%G1344>justified<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and in the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of our <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for me, but not <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G4851>profitable.<s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for me, but I will not be <S%G1850>mastered<s%> by <S%G5100>anything.<s%>

<S%G1033>Food<s%> is for the <S%G2836>stomach,<s%> and the <S%G2836>stomach<s%> is for <S%G1033>food;<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G2673>do<s%> <S%G2673>away<s%> with <S%G2532>both<s%> of them. <S%G1161>Yet<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> is not for <S%G4202>immorality,<s%> but for the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is for the <S%G4983>body.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has not <S%G2532>only<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> but will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1825>raise<s%> us up <S%G1223>through<s%> His <S%G1411>power.<s%>

Do you not <S%G3609>know<s%> that your <S%G4983>bodies<s%> are <S%G3196>members<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>? Shall I <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G3196>members<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> and <S%G4160>make<s%> them <S%G3196>members<s%> of a <S%G4204>harlot<s%>? May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be!

<S%G2228>Or<s%> do you not <S%G3609>know<s%> that the one who <S%G2853>joins<s%> himself to a <S%G4204>harlot<s%> is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> [with her]? For He <S%G5346>says,<s%> "The <S%G1417>two<s%> will <S%G1510>become<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>"
But the one who <S%G2853>joins<s%> himself to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> [with Him.]

<S%G5343>Flee<s%> <S%G4202>immorality.<s%> <S%G3956>Every<s%> [other] <S%G265>sin<s%> that a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4160>commits<s%> is <S%G1622>outside<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> but the <S%G4203>immoral<s%> man <S%G264>sins<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4983>body.<s%>

<S%G2228>Or<s%> do you not <S%G3609>know<s%> that your <S%G4983>body<s%> is a <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> who is in you, <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> from <S%G2316>God,<s%> and that you are not your <S%G1438>own<s%>?
For you have been <S%G59>bought<s%> with a <S%G5092>price:<s%> <S%G1211>therefore<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> in your <S%G4983>body.<s%>
